title: Earth is a Mobius Strip
body:
Well, it is. Flat earthers were half right, rounders the other half. There IS curvature on the flat plain. Your day and night cycle, as well as your seasons are accounted for as well, as the earth rotates along the strip. And here's the kicker...

There is a whole other world on the other half that NASA and all the world governments don't want you to know about. 

But hey, keep circulating your bullshit pictures of earth. Stay asleep. Fuck if I care, guys. Do the math. You'll see I'm right.
